summary: This is a brief email regarding the logistics of obtaining a spare hard drive for a camera system from Victorville, to be sent via FedEx overnight to MCC (likely Metropolitan Correctional Center). It appears to be a routine administrative communication about equipment.

events.title: Hard drive shipment arranged
events.description: After speaking to Victorville, a spare hard drive for a camera system was arranged to be sent via FedEx overnight to MCC.

keyFacts: On February 7, 2019, a spare hard drive for a camera system was being shipped from Victorville to MCC.
The shipment was arranged via FedEx overnight service.
The document is a logistical email about equipment, with no direct mention of individuals or case-related events.
